mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev on ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.user = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '102'
and ll.source like '%${source}%'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and ll.interface_type like '%${interfaceType}%'
and ll.result like '%${result}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${invokerName}%'
and ll.dispose_time like '%${disposeTime}%'
and ll.interface_name like '%${interfaceName}%'
and ll.create_time like '%${createTime}%'

SELECT ll.source, eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_name, dev.app_id, ll.interface_type, eqi.equipment_ip, eqi.equipment_continue_port, ll.create_time, ll.json, ll.result, ll.dispose_start_time, ll.dispose_end_time, cur.USER_NAME AS invokerName, ll.dispose_time, ll.interface_name FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev on ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.user = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '102'
and ll.source like '%${source}%'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and ll.interface_type like '%${interfaceType}%'
and ll.result like '%${result}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${invokerName}%'
and ll.dispose_time like '%${disposeTime}%'
and ll.interface_name like '%${interfaceName}%'
and ll.create_time like '%${createTime}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
mapper.insert: insert into log_log (log_id, log_type, equipment_int, device_id, source, interface_type, create_time, json, result, dispose_start_time, dispose_end_time, user, dispose_time, interface_name) values (#{logId}, #{logType}, #{equipmentInt}, #{deviceId}, #{source}, #{interfaceType}, #{createTime}, #{json}, #{result}, #{disposeStartTime}, #{disposeEndTime}, #{user}, #{disposeTime}, #{interfaceName})
